# Project Management Skill (English)
Documents PM/coordination workflows for `tspec-runner`.

## Focus
- Request intake, plan proposals, risk escalation, and cross-team handoffs.
- Logging progress in Knowledge/TODO docs and clarifying prioritization.

## Support members
- PM Lead (maps requests to timelines, ensures skill alignment)
- Stakeholder Liaison (keeps GitHub/issue status updated)
- QA/Release Partners (notify on blockers for verification and publishing)

## How to use
1. For any new feature/fix request, consult this folder to draft the plan.
2. Summarize impacted skills, tests, and dependencies in both English and Japanese notes.
3. After work completes, confirm with the PM lead and update `docs/Knowledge.md`.

## Notes
- Summary also found in `../pm_skill.md`.
